document.full_text: the daughter of a detained human rights activist in bahrain began a hunger strike on monday, calling on the authorities to release her father and other members of her family who have been arrested.
document.title: the lede: bahrain activist starts hunger strike
lines_and_colors: the daughter of a detained human rights activist in bahrain began a hunger strike on monday, calling on the authorities to release her father and other members of her family who have been arrested.
